title: PlanetEstyle Font?
content:
Photoshop says it is PlanetEstyle any idea where to find this font I can not seem to locate it. Thank-you in advance

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091739im_/http:/typophile.com/files/voonFont_5386.jpg)
author: stessier

comments.content:
The name should be spaced as “Planet E Style”.

You could try contacting this guy who seems to be using it for something mobile phone related. Recent blog entry but I think he is in Azerbaijan.

[http://nahidthemes.azeriblog.com/2009/01/09/my-used-font-planet-e-style](http://web.archive.org/web/20090619091739/http:/nahidthemes.azeriblog.com/2009/01/09/my-used-font-planet-e-style)

Most Google references for that name will be music related, about the Detroit record label.
